notifMax: Notify me when my batterie is charging at 100%
notifTwenty: Notify me when my battery is under 20%
notifTen: Notify me when my battery is under 10%

battery100.title: Your battery is at 100%
battery100.message: You should stop charging your battery

battery10.title: Your battery is under 10%
battery10.message: You should charge your battery as soon as possible

battery20.title: Your battery is under 20%
battery20.message: You should keep in mind you'll have to charge your battery
